member.name: T:Microsoft.Web.Http.Description.ApiDescriptionGroup
member.summary: Represents a group of versioned API descriptions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Web.Http.Description.ApiDescriptionGroup.#ctor(Microsoft.Web.Http.ApiVersion)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The API version associated with the group.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.Http.Description.ApiDescriptionGroup.ApiVersion
member.summary: Gets the version associated with the group of APIs.
member.value: An API version.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.Http.Description.ApiDescriptionGroup.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the API description group.
member.value: The API version description group name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.Http.Description.ApiDescriptionGroup.IsDeprecated
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether API version is deprecated for all described APIs in the group.
member.value: True if all APIs in the group are deprecated; otherwise, false.
member.remarks: An API version will only be described as deprecated when all all corresponding service implementations are also deprecated. It is possible that some API versions may be partially deprecated, in which case this property will return false, but individual actions may report that they are deprecated.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.Http.Description.ApiDescriptionGroup.ApiDescriptions
member.summary: Gets a collection of API descriptions for the current version.
member.value: A collection of versioned API descriptions.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Web.Http.Description.ApiDescriptionGroupCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection of grouped API descriptions.

member.param: The item to get the key for.
member.returns: The key of the item.

member.summary: Gets or adds a new API description group for the specified API version.
member.param: The API version to get a description group for.
member.returns: A new or existing API description group.

member.returns: A new or existing API description group.

member.summary: Gets a read-only collection of all of the API versions in the collection.
member.value: A read-only list of API versions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Web.Http.Description.ApiDescriptionGroupCollection.Flatten
member.summary: Transforms all of the groups in the collection to a flat list of API descriptions.
member.returns: A flat, collection of API descriptions.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Web.Http.Description.ApiExplorerOptions
member.content: Provides additional implementation specific to ASP.NET Web API.
member.summary: Represents the possible API versioning options for the API explorer.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Web.Http.Description.ApiExplorerOptions.#ctor(System.Web.Http.HttpConfiguration)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The current configuration associated with the options.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.Http.Description.ApiExplorerOptions.DefaultApiVersion
member.summary: Gets the default API version applied to services that do not have explicit versions.
member.value: The default API version.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.Http.Description.ApiExplorerOptions.AssumeDefaultVersionWhenUnspecified
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether a default version is assumed when a client does does not provide a service API version.
member.value: True if the a default API version should be assumed when a client does not provide a service API version; otherwise, false. The default value derives from .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.Http.Description.ApiExplorerOptions.ApiVersionParameterSource
member.summary: Gets the source for defining API version parameters.
member.value: The API version parameter source used to describe API version parameters.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.Http.Description.ApiExplorerOptions.GroupNameFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format used to create group names from API versions.
member.value: The string format used to format an API version as a group name. The default value is null.
member.remarks: For information about API version formatting, review as well as the and methods.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.Http.Description.ApiExplorerOptions.SubstitutionFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format used to format the API version value substituted in route templates.
member.value: The string format used to format an API version in a route template. The default value is "VVV", which formats the major version number and optional minor version.
member.remarks: For information about API version formatting, review as well as the and methods.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.Http.Description.ApiExplorerOptions.SubstituteApiVersionInUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the API version parameter should be substituted in route templates.
member.value: True if the API version parameter should be substituted in route templates; otherwise, false. The default value is false.
member.remarks: Setting this property to true will also remove the API version parameter from the corresponding API description.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.Http.Description.ApiExplorerOptions.DefaultApiVersionParameterDescription
member.summary: Gets or sets the default description used for API version parameters.
member.value: The default description for API version parameters. The default value is "The requested API version".
